who.title: Who am I?
who.text:
Hi, I'm Asthriona, I don't have a name, people call me 'weeb' or 'hey you!'.
Im kind, everyone like me. I don't know why.
I like Anime (maybe why everyone call me weeb), Video games (mainly World of Warcraft).
Im part of Eternal Vengeance, The best WoW guild EU.

what.title: What I do everyday
what.text: I'm mostly working on personal Project Like Yukiko, Freyja, Watcher, Loky, Asthriona networks. Playing video games is also a big part of my life since i'm able to hold a controler. i've got promoted admin of Eternal Veangeance, wich is a WoW Guilds and comunity around gaming in general. I'm their main tank (M+ player 92th thank of Maggi in S4), But also managing part of the guild events, and official developper. In the real world I'm a Network Engineer and kinda lost developper, Still learning.

wow.title: World Of Warcraft
wow.text:
This game became a big part of my life, I play since the last patch of Burning Crusade.
My oldest archivement is [WoW's 5th Anniversary]
I mainly play Death Knight Level 120 called MÃ¢koto on Magtheridon.
and gearing up a Druid restauration called 'Maryy'
